VfpClient.dll has been added to your project.

-- Requirement
You need to have VfpOleDb installed for VfpClient to work.  

-- In package directory
* VfpOleDbSetup.msi - for you to install if you don't already have it installed.
* VfpClient.msi 
  - Installs VfpOleDb
  - Installs VfpClient.dll in the GAC 
  - Adds registry settings to integrate VfpClient with Visual Studio


----------------------------------------------------
Released to the public domain, use at your own risk.

----------------------
VFP Client for ADO.Net
https://github.com/tombrothers/VfpClient
http://randomdevnotes.com/tag/vfpclient/
Tom Brothers (tombrothers@outlook.com)
